greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Triangle T(n,k) (n >= 2, 1 <= k <= n-1) read by rows: row n gives epispectrum of a path P_n (see reference for precise definition).
link: Toufik Mansour, Armend Sh. Shabani, Bargraphs in bargraphs, Turkish Journal of Mathematics (2018) Vol. 42, Issue 5, 2763-2773.
M. A. Michels and U. Knauer, The congruence classes of paths and cycles, Discr. Math., 309 (2009), 5352-5359.
results.author: _N. J. A. Sloane_, Sep 20 2009
